item.title: 前官员称 CFPB 数据受网络安全合同取消影响
item.description: 美国消费者金融保护局的一位前高级官员在周五提交的法庭文件中说，该局取消了近三十份网络安全合同，这危及到联邦监管机构所维护的敏感数据的安全。【原文：The cancellation of nearly three-dozen cybersecurity contracts at the US Consumer Financial Protection Bureau endangers the security of sensitive data maintained by the federal watchdog, a former senior official at the bureau said in court documents filed Friday.】

item.title: 美联储古尔斯比警告不要过度依赖生产率增长
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）称赞了近期生产率的增长，但警告说，过度预期生产率增长对经济的积极影响可能会让央行陷入 "艰难境地"。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee lauded the recent increase in productivity growth, but warned that over-anticipating positive economic effects from it could put the central bank in a “tough position.”】

item.title: 惠普首席执行官称正考虑将部分生产转移至美国
item.description: 惠普公司（HP Inc.首席执行官恩里克-洛雷斯（Enrique Lores）表示，随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）以关税威胁世界各国并迫使企业加大国内投资，这家硬件制造商正在考虑将部分生产转移到美国。【原文：HP Inc. Chief Executive Officer Enrique Lores said the hardware maker is considering moving some of its manufacturing to the US as President Donald Trump threatens nations around the world with tariffs and presses corporations to invest more domestically.】

item.title: 沃尔玛首席执行官警告食品价格带来 "沮丧和痛苦
item.description: 沃尔玛公司首席执行官表示，由于食品价格居高不下，美国消费者正显示出压力迹象。【原文：The chief executive officer of Walmart Inc. said American consumers are showing signs of stress as food prices remain stubbornly high.】

item.title: 不可能的三人组与 AT&T 数据被黑客窃取并企图出售数据有关
item.description: 加拿大人康纳-穆卡（Connor Moucka）高中辍学，与祖父相依为命。住在土耳其的美国人约翰-宾斯担心联邦调查局和中央情报局正在追踪他。美国士兵卡梅伦-瓦根纽斯（Cameron Wagenius）据称在谷歌上搜索如何叛逃到俄罗斯。【原文：Connor Moucka, a Canadian, dropped out of high school and lived with his grandfather. John Binns, an American living in Turkey, feared the FBI and CIA were tracking him. Cameron Wagenius, a US soldier, allegedly Googled how to defect to Russia.】

item.title: 中国关税和资金削减促使伊利诺伊州创下 23 年来最糟糕的一个月
item.description: 二月份，Illumina 公司的投资者每周都接连遭遇挫折，使这家基因测序公司有望结束近 23 年来最糟糕的一个月。【原文：Illumina Inc. investors suffered back-to-back setbacks each week in February, putting the gene-sequencing company on track to cap off its worst month in nearly 23 years.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔法官暂停副总统权利两年
item.description: 厄瓜多尔选举法院暂停了厄瓜多尔二把手的政治权利，理由是她参与了与性别有关的暴力行为，在她与总统丹尼尔-诺沃亚（Daniel Noboa）不和的情况下，法院实际上解除了她的职务。【原文：An electoral court suspended the political rights of Ecuador’s second-in-command for engaging in what it said was gender-related violence, effectively removing her from office amid her feud with President Daniel Noboa.】

item.title: 英特尔将俄亥俄州芯片项目推迟到 2030 年代
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）正在进一步推迟俄亥俄州备受瞩目的新半导体园区的开业时间，这标志着这家芯片制造商的扩张计划遭遇了最新挫折。【原文：Intel Corp. is further delaying the opening of a much-touted new semiconductor complex in Ohio, marking the latest setback to the chipmaker’s expansion plans.】

item.title: 关注下一期 NFIB 小型企业景气报告
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: XMS Capital Partners 聘用资深银行家 Rick Kimball
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，XMS Capital Partners 已聘请前医疗保健投资银行家 Rick Kimball 担任董事总经理。【原文：XMS Capital Partners has hired former health-care investment banker Rick Kimball as a managing director, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 意大利联合信贷银行首席执行官奥塞尔将与意大利官员会谈银行交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利政府计划最早于周一与意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 会晤，讨论包括该银行对 Banco BPM 的恶意竞购在内的议题。【原文：The Italian government is planning to meet with UniCredit SpA Chief Executive Andrea Orcel as early as Monday to discuss topics including the bank’s hostile bid for Banco BPM, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 泰晤士水务资深债权人对英国公用事业感到 "非常满意
item.description: 泰晤士河水务公司最大的债权人之一 Assured Guaranty 的高级管理人员表示，他们对这家陷入困境的英国公用事业公司的前景持乐观态度，因为该公司的紧急流动资金申请已获得批准。【原文：Senior executives at Assured Guaranty, one of the largest creditors to Thames Water, said they’re optimistic about the troubled UK utility after it won approval for emergency liquidity.】

item.title: 贝莱德首次将比特币 ETF 纳入模型投资组合
item.description: 全球最大的资产管理公司终于允许比特币进入其价值 1500 亿美元的模型投资组合领域。【原文：The world’s biggest asset manager is finally allowing Bitcoin into its $150 billion model-portfolio universe.】

item.title: 为日间交易者提供双倍杠杆的特朗普媒体 ETF 即将上市
item.description: 一个提供双倍回报的交易所交易基金--特朗普媒体与科技集团公司（Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. 将最早于下周开始交易，这是该动荡的社交媒体公司的第一个此类产品。【原文：An exchange-traded fund offering double the returns of the volatile Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. is set to start trading as early as next week, in the first such product riding the volatile social-media company.】

item.title: 奈拉贬值导致 MTN 尼日利亚公司股价再次下跌
item.description: 由于投资者对奈拉大幅贬值造成的第二年亏损做出了反应，MTN 集团有限公司的尼日利亚分公司在拉各斯创下了 10 个月来的最大跌幅，随后有所回升。【原文：The Nigerian unit of MTN Group Ltd fell the most in 10 months in Lagos before recovering, as investors reacted to a second year of loss caused by a sharp devaluation of the naira.】

item.title: 安哥拉称将遵守仲裁员关于偿还贷款的命令
item.description: 安哥拉财政部长Vera Daves de Sousa说，在俄罗斯入侵乌克兰后，安哥拉的贷款人受到制裁，如果仲裁员命令安哥拉支付贷款，安哥拉将结清这笔被冻结的贷款。【原文：Angola will settle a loan that was frozen after its lenders became subject to sanctions following Russia’s invasion of Ukraine if an arbitrator orders it to pay, Finance Minister Vera Daves de Sousa said.】

item.title: 印度中央银行的美元空头账面余额达到创纪录的 775 亿美元
item.description: 1 月份，印度央行在衍生品市场上的美元空头账本创下新纪录，反映出印度央行为应对美元飙升所做的努力。【原文：The Indian central bank’s short dollar book in the derivatives market hit a fresh record in January, reflecting its efforts to counter a surging dollar.】

item.title: 监管机构称 Revolut 需要许可证才能在乌克兰开展业务
item.description: 英国 Revolut 公司本月早些时候宣布，乌克兰居民现在可以在该公司开设账户，乌克兰央行对此表示，Revolut 没有在乌克兰运营的许可证。【原文：Revolut doesn’t have a license to operate in Ukraine, the country’s central bank said in reaction to an announcement by the UK firm earlier this month that Ukrainian residents can now open accounts with it.】

item.title: 微软斥资 85 亿美元收购 Skype 14 年后将关闭 Skype
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）正在向 Skype 发出终结的信号，Skype 是微软近 14 年前收购的标志性互联网通话和聊天服务。【原文：Microsoft Corp. is signaling the end of the line for Skype, the iconic internet calling and chat service it bought almost 14 years ago.】

item.title: Grifols 首席财务官认为将重返公共债务市场进行再融资
item.description: Grifols SA 首席财务官拉胡尔-斯里尼瓦桑（Rahul Srinivasan）周五在接受采访时表示，Grifols SA 计划重返公开市场进行再融资，首先将发行 2027 年到期的债券。【原文：Grifols SA plans to return to public markets for refinancing, starting with a bond due in 2027, Chief Financial Officer Rahul Srinivasan said in an interview Friday.】

item.title: 美国商品贸易逆差因进口激增而扩大至创纪录水平
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普承诺征收关税前进口激增，1 月份美国商品贸易逆差意外扩大，创下历史新高。【原文：The US merchandise trade deficit widened unexpectedly in January to a record as imports surged ahead of President Donald Trump’s promised tariffs.】

item.title: 美联储青睐的通胀指标温和上升，支出下降
item.description: 美联储首选的基本通胀指标在 1 月份温和上升，在一系列报告显示物价压力再次升温、消费者缩减支出之后，这一指标提供了一些缓解。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s preferred measure of underlying inflation rose at a mild pace in January, offering some relief after a string of reports suggested price pressures are heating up again, while consumers pulled back on spending.】

item.title: 中国煤炭企业呼吁抑制价格下跌带来的供应过剩
item.description: 中国顶级煤炭集团呼吁煤炭企业调整生产，以防止在价格下跌的情况下出现 "严重 "的供过于求。【原文：China’s top coal groups have called for companies in the sector to adjust their production to prevent “severe” oversupply amid falling prices.】

item.title: 加拿大经济超出预期，第四季度增长 2.6
item.description: (彭博社）--由于央行大力降息促进了家庭支出，加拿大上一季度经济增长加速，并将这一势头延续到了今年年初。【原文：(Bloomberg) - Canada’s economic growth accelerated last quarter and momentum carried into the start of this year as the central bank’s forceful rate cuts boosted household spending.】

item.title: 津巴布韦中央银行行长称津巴布韦不存在外汇 "问题
item.description: 津巴布韦中央银行行长向南部非洲国家保证，津巴布韦没有货币 "问题"。【原文：Zimbabwe has ample dollars to supply demand, according to the head of the central bank, who assured the southern African nation that it does not have a currency “problem.”】

item.title: 欧洲春季伊始遭遇寒流的风险增加
item.description: 极端天气事件的预测使人们对欧洲春季温和的开端和能源需求下降的预测产生了怀疑。【原文：Forecasts for a mild start to spring in Europe — and declining energy demand — have been thrown into doubt by predictions of an extreme weather event.】

item.title: Omers 注销对破产企业 Northvolt 的 3.25 亿美元投资
item.description: 去年申请破产保护的瑞典电动汽车电池制造商 Northvolt AB 在安大略省市政雇员退休系统（Ontario Municipal Employees Retirement System）的 3.25 亿美元投资出现亏损。【原文：The Ontario Municipal Employees Retirement System booked a loss on its $325 million investment in Northvolt AB, the Swedish electric vehicle battery maker that filed for bankruptcy protection last year.】

item.title: 继法国和意大利通胀放缓之后，德国通胀也未能放缓
item.description: 德国 2 月份的通胀率出乎意料地保持不变，这凸显了欧洲中央银行在决定降息的速度和幅度方面所面临的挑战。【原文：German inflation unexpectedly remained unchanged in February, highlighting the challenges for the European Central Bank in deciding how quickly and how far to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 安哥拉计划重返欧洲债券市场，发行15亿美元债券
item.description: 安哥拉财政部长Vera Daves de Sousa说，安哥拉正考虑三年来首次出售欧元债券，筹集约15亿美元，用于再融资或偿还未偿债务，并为国家预算提供资金。【原文：Angola is considering raising about $1.5 billion in its first eurobond sale in three years to refinance or repay outstanding debt and fund the country’s budget, Finance Minister Vera Daves de Sousa said.】

item.title: 人工智能将颠覆关于公司组织方式的基本假设
item.description:
经济建立在专业知识稀缺且昂贵的基础之上。人工智能将使其变得丰富且几乎免费。【原文：

The economy is built on the idea that expertise is scarce and expensive. AI is about to make it abundant and practically free.

】
